div.span:
Devices are already registered with Basic Authentication within Cumulocity and the CA is used to create the device certificate
2 Options are available
Key pair is generated on the connected device
Key pair is generated on the server
Devices uses the Cumulocity externalID, if it exists to create the certificate otherwise we recommend using the serial number of the device

switch.text: Devices are already registered with Basic Authentication within Cumulocity and the CA is used to create the d...

div.div: Hints: To have a secure way we plan to handover to the device the URL from Nexus where the device can download its private certificate via an Operation and via EST.

div.style: text-align: left; font-size: 16px;

div.div: So the microservice is the man in the middle to make sure the device can download via EST the private certificate
